parameters.name: HttpEndpoint
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the access channel for instance metadata. Valid values:

*   enabled
*   disabled

Default value: enabled.

>  For information about instance metadata, see [Obtain instance metadata](~~49122~~).

parameters.name: HttpPutResponseHopLimit
parameters.description: >  This parameter is not publicly available.

parameters.name: HttpTokens
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to forcefully use the security hardening mode (IMDSv2) to access instance metadata. Valid values:

*   optional: does not forcefully use the security hardening mode (IMDSv2).
*   required: forcefully uses the security hardening mode (IMDSv2). After you set this parameter to required, you cannot access instance metadata in normal mode.

Default value: optional.

>  For more information about modes of accessing instance metadata, see [Obtain instance metadata](~~150575~~).

parameters.name: InstanceMetadataTags
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the access channel for instance metadata. Valid values:

*   enabled
*   disabled

Default value: disabled.

>  The tag key must be a combination of letters, digits, @, colons (:), underscores (\_), hyphens (-), periods (.), equal signs (=), and commas (,). The tag key cannot be "." or "..". Otherwise, the tag key cannot be accessed in the metadata.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
